ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'They will know tomorrow who the impudent liar is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Tomorrow they will know who is the impudent liar!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (We told Our Messenger): “Tomorrow they shall know who is the insolent liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (We told Salih), "Tomorrow they will know who is the most arrogant liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It was said to Saleh, “They will soon realise tomorrow who is the mischievous great liar.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Tomorrow they will come to know who is the liar, the insolent one!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Tomorrow shall they know who is the liar, the insolent one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They shall surely know tomorrow who is the impudent liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Unto their warner it was said): To-morrow they will know who is the rash liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [We said to him] "Tomorrow they shall know who is the boastful liar,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They shall know tomorrow whichsoever is a liar insolent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Tomorrow they will know who is a self-conceited liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ah! they will know on the morrow, which is the liar, the insolent one!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Tomorrow they will come to know, who is the liar, the insolent one!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (To him We said): 'Tomorrow they shall know who is the arrogant liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will know tomorrow who the wicked liar is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:26] ‘They will know tomorrow, in the Hereafter, who is the conceited liar, and it is them, for they will be chastised for having denied their prophet Sālih.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Salih said to them: (Tomorrow) on the Day of Judgement (they will know who is the rash liar) who is the vain liar who lies against Allah.
